mapper.insert: insert into employee (username, realname, password, number_phone, email, dept_id, input_time, status, admin) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{inputTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{admin,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update employee set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number_phone = #{numberPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, input_time = #{inputTime,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, admin = #{admin,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, realname, password, number_phone, email, dept_id, input_time, status, admin from employee where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, username, realname, password, number_phone, email, dept_id, input_time, status, admin from employee
